title: FANTOM Update: Raise $WFTM, $ETH, $BTC, $LINK Collateral Cap
body:
Intro: This is a vote to update collateral caps on FANTOM C.R.E.A.M. market for the following assets: WFTM, ETH, BTC, LINK.

Proposal: Listing Committee

Rational: Update and improve FANTOM market.

For: 
Raise Collateral Cap:
 Asset - $amt; token amt
WFTM - $10,000,000; 18,257,303 
ETH - $1,000,000; 301 
BTC - $5,000,000; 101 
LINK - $500,000; 17,427

Against:
 Do not make any changes to FANTOM market.
author: 0x81f8CaBe89066d43EB4faFD8E4E5256C102E6E30
